seg1d.Segmenter.clear_reference¶

Segmenter.clear_reference()[source]¶

Removes any reference data currently assigned

Parameters:
None
Returns:
None

See also

add_reference
Add a reference item

Notes

This method also clears the rF, and rLen attributes.

Examples

>>> import numpy as np
>>> import seg1d
>>>
>>> s = seg1d.Segmenter()
>>> s.add_reference( np.linspace(0,3,3) )
>>> s.r
[{'0': array([0. , 1.5, 3. ])}]
>>> s.clear_reference()
>>> s.r
[]
